p:
Therefore, in the present study, we have explored whether a time-dependent signature exists for norovirus transmissibility by investigating the epidemiological dataset for Japan [ 24]. Our purpose was to estimate the R
y for NVI as a function of time using the national surveillance data and employing a few parsimonious mathematical models. We also explored the possible impact of the predominance of genogroup GII and genotype GII.4 on the time-dependent change in NVI transmissibility. These study objectives were accomplished using the following methods and data.
